Package KI304.Shevchuk.Lab3

Class MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment

java.lang.Object
KI304.Shevchuk.Lab3.AlpinistsEquipment
KI304.Shevchuk.Lab3.MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment
All Implemented Interfaces:
MilitaryEquipment
public class MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment extends AlpinistsEquipment implements MilitaryEquipment
The MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment class represents military equipment for alpinists. It implements the MilitaryEquipment interface.

    • MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment

      public MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment(String itemName, double weight, String description, double price, int camoPattern, boolean nightVision)
      Constructs a new MilitaryAlpinistsEquipment object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the equipment.
      weight - The weight of the equipment in grams.
      description - The description of the equipment.
      price - The price of the equipment in dollars.
      camoPattern - The camouflage pattern of the equipment.
      nightVision - Indicates whether the equipment has night vision capability.
